overview: Ran Sayura is a 2017 Sri Lankan action film directed by Sudesh Wasantha Pieris and produced by J.H. Wasantha Kumara and S.A. Sanjeewa Kumara under their Mahee Tharu Films banner. The film features Wasantha Kumaravila and Roger Seneviratne as the leading actors and Himali Siriwardena as the leading actress.The film was released on 16 February 2017 in Sri Lanka.It is the 1269th Sri Lankan film in the Sinhala cinema.
title: Ran Sayura
